register.description: Interrupt enable and status register Interrupt flag fields will be cleared through read access using the following byte-enable values: 0xC 0xF

register.description: Stores source start address If the transfer configured from memory port, all bits are taken into account as an address. If the transfer configured from peripheral port, the lower 4 bits will determine the FIFO ID.

Stores the number of 4-byte words in a DMA data block. Maximum is 65,536.
